description: Working upon research project on network simulations and distributed ML systems under IIITD's Network Security Lab.
Teaching Assistant in conducting tutorials, resolving queries, and grading for core computer science courses at IIITD.
Managing logistics, maintaining data records, and assisting ground operations to strengthen bonds between people in the DP Works project of Satsang.
Organized events, coordinated performances, and promoted cultural activities as a core member of Bahurupi at GCETTS.
